short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hockey Start is a Chrome Extension for the New Tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Hockey Start Chrome Extension for your New Tab: Dive into the World of Hockey!

Brought to you by Virtue Traffic Ltd.

Get direct access to top-tier Hockey sites for up-to-the-minute scores, the latest on Hockey, and more. We bring you an unparalleled sports experience right on your new tab. Get fast and easy access to major websites with Hockey news and updates.

The search results used within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing. 

By adding the "Hockey Start" extension to your browser, you're accepting its 
Terms of Service (https://hockeystart.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://hockeystart.com/privacy.html)

While the search capabilities in the extension come from Microsoft Bing, rest assured it won't modify any settings associated with your primary browser search.
